markdown:
<title level="1" right="Creature Family">[Villains](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=198)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 246</row>

Villains pursue selfish and cruel goals, trampling over anyone foolish or purehearted enough to stand in their way.

<title level="2">Members</title>
[Antipaladin](/NPCs.aspx?ID=961) (Creature 5), [Despot](/NPCs.aspx?ID=962) (Creature 5), [Gang Leader](/NPCs.aspx?ID=964) (Creature 7), [Mastermind](/NPCs.aspx?ID=960) (Creature 4), [Reckless Scientist](/NPCs.aspx?ID=963) (Creature 6), [Saboteur](/NPCs.aspx?ID=959) (Creature 2)
name: Villains
